name: Full Flight Experience - Allentown (ABE) to Detroit (DTW) Delta CRJ200
description:
Thanks for watching this Full Flight Experience!  After a brief visit with family, my sister and I were ready to head home.  The first of our return flights left from Lehigh Valley International Airport (ABE), a small, regional hub in eastern Pennsylvania toward Detroit Metropolitan Airport (DTW), one of Delta’s largest hubs.   

First, this video covers the initial arrival at LVIA, a brief tour of their modest terminal, our plane’s arrival, boarding, pushback, and taxi.  From there, you’ll get a nice view during takeoff as we climb through the low-altitude clouds and emerge in a beautiful mid-afternoon sky.  After a short time in the air, we make a unique approach into DTW, complete with low cumulus clouds on final approach.

Special thanks to my sister for putting up with my strange requests and switching seats with me!
--------------------------------
Flight Information
Airline: Delta Connection (Expressjet)
Flight Number: DL5296
Date of Flight: Sunday, October 2nd, 2016

Origin Airport: Lehigh Valley International Airport (KABE/ABE)
Destination Airport: Detroit Metropolitan Airport (KDTW/DTW)

Departing Gate: 10
Scheduled Departure: 12:55 EDT
Actual Departure from Gate: 13:00 EDT
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 6 / 13:08 EDT
Landing Runway and Time: RWY 21L / 14:35 EDT
Scheduled Arrival: 14:41 EDT
Actual Arrival at Gate: 14:41 EDT
Arriving Gate: B8

--------------------------------
Aircraft Information
Type: Bombardier CRJ-200ER
Registration: N927EV 
Aircraft Delivery: September 2003 (Expressjet in December 2011)
Engines: 2x GE CF34-3B1
Seat: 11A

--------------------------------
Video Highlights and Timeline
00:10 – ABE Terminal Tour
00:40 – Plane Approaching Gate
01:00 – Boarding
01:30 – Pushback and Taxi
02:50 – Takeoff
04:30 – At Altitude
06:00 – Initial Descent
06:00 – Initial Descent
10:00 – Final Approach
11:30 – Landing and Taxi
13:20 – Gate Arrival and Deplaning

--------------------------------
Gear
Nikon D3200/18-55mm lens
LP Microphone
GO PRO Hero
